name: The Blood Cat
description:
The Blood Cat

You are a cat destined to be a mighty Blood God. But since you have been raised by robots all your life you need their attention and love to survive. But you can't get too much either or you'll be overwhelmed. Kill as many robots as possible while keeping the attention level reasonable.

Note:  The web version is considerably slow, Download the Windows EXE to have an good time.

You can attack the robots with your mighty axe or scratch to wake them up from their madness and they will try to stop other robots from coming to you, in a way helping you to not get overwhelmed with their attention.
Your attention meter will increase when the love-mad robots come near you, and it will decrease when you are far from them.

This game was made in 3 days for the ScoreSpaceJam#23.
If you play this game don't forget to rate it here.

Controls:

WASD: Move the player up-down-left-right
Space: Attack
Shift: Scratch
